Summary: DARK TO BRIGHT GOLDEN ORANGE WITH HALO pulsating
divs: sighting detailsit was the forth of july i live in the city my block is like a war zone on the forth of july 8in motors going off every five minutes these where not fire works. i came home from wendys at about 11 pm looked up in the sky over my house and saw this glowing sphere it had a halo around it . this object was high in the sky i watched it for minutes before getting my family to come out and see it. just to see what they thought :). they watched it for 5 min also. their was no smoke trail from this object it kept going in a straight line with no sound until it became to far for us to see. then about an hr later my wife was looking out the dining room window and saw 2 of the exact objects float over the house and in the same path as the first one. i watched these also for lets say a min went out side and they where floationg over my house again i called my 2 boys to come out and look at these objects. as i was looking at the objects i was saying their going out like a flare or a paruchet. i rly dont think it was a flare or a parachute but u nvr know again i live in a well populated city i have neabors no less then 50 feet from my house also let me state this again their was not smoke trail and they pluseadted 1. i was getting out of my car with wendys. 2. i always look at the sky plus it the 4\7\08. 3. a flare or parachute 4. pluseated no noise had a halo ive nvr seen anything like it. 5. my first reation was what is that 6. all i can say is it looked like something that was at full power then went to 1\2 power then back to full power then glowed real faint then i lost sight of it we tried to to get vedio but the cam corder was out of batteis
